doc.title: Frontline: How to preserve our Hawker Heritage?
doc.text: Here/RB is/VBZ the/DT episode/NN of/IN Frontline/NN first/JJ aired/NN on/IN Ch/DT 8/CD on/IN 3/CD May/. 2013/CD at/IN 10.30/NNP pm/NNP ./. Thanks/JJ to/TO Sen/VB for/IN the/DT video/NN upload/NN !/. Here/RB are/VBP two/CD of/IN the/DT stalls/NN that/WDT were/VBD featured/NN :/: 1/CD ./. Xiao/NNP Di/NNP Hokkien/NNP Mee/NNP 2/CD ./. Heaven/JJ Putu/NN Mayyam/NN Here/RB is/VBZ the/DT bottomline/NN :/. If/CC we/PRP want/VB to/TO be/VB able/JJ to/TO eat/VB good/JJ ,/, traditional/JJ hawker/NN food/NN in/IN the/DT future/NN ,/, we/PRP need/VBP to/TO nurture/VB the/DT next/JJ generation/NN of/IN hawkers/NNS now/RB !/. If/IN we/PRP continue/VBD to/TO complain/VB whenever/IN a/DT young/JJ hawker/NN raises/IN the/DT price/NN of/IN his/PRP$ plate/NN of/IN Hokkien/NNP Mee/NNP by/IN 50/CD cents/NN ,/, then/RB he/PRP will/MD end/VB up/IN selling/VBG pasta/NN instead/RB !/.
